welcome_message_body: Welcome to Williamsburg, where history and charm come together to create a truly unique experience. Explore our colonial heritage, vibrant arts scene, and picturesque streets, and make the most of your visit. Enjoy your time in our beautiful city!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Felker AAF Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Felker AAF Airport is used exclusively for military flights and operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Newport News/Williamsburg International Airport serves all commercial flights and features a variety of amenities for passengers.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Newport News/Williamsburg International Airport caters to private and charter flights, offering a comfortable and convenient experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy complimentary WiFi throughout the airport.
